title: Workshop on Educational Video Production Based on the ADDIE Model

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical environment setup using digital devices (tablets, laptops) with continuous feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can write science-subject instructional video scenarios by applying the five phases of the ADDIE model: analysis, design, development, implementation, and evaluation
Learners can produce videos that improve learning effectiveness by 20% or more through cognitive load theory-informed visual elements (animations, graphs) and text organization
Learners can create 5-minute science experiment video prototypes using video production tools (PowerPoint, open-source screencasting tools)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
